betterquesting:10.desc:8:
This level houses several... §eweird properties§r. Including a §ecrystal shard§r that is said to be used in §emaking a seed§r that can §o§egrow the ungrowable§r.

We at §9NeoTechnologies§r don't know much about this weird seed, so making some and playing around with the plant would prove to be quite useful in our studies.

§eCollect a §6Prosperity Shard§e to begin this questline§r.
